item.title: MSÂ Office for Mac … sigh
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: What else can I say? It’s ridiclousely slow. I’m on Excel now, every single copy and paste took me close to a minute, without any reason. I tried to reboot the machine, re-compsoe the sheet, and lots of other tricks that I can imagine, but nothing works. Even Office in the VM on the same [...]
item.content:encoded:
What else can I say? It’s ridiclousely slow.

I’m on Excel now, every single copy and paste took me close to a minute, without any reason. I tried to reboot the machine, re-compsoe the sheet, and lots of other tricks that I can imagine, but nothing works. Even Office in the VM on the same box works much faster.

item.title: New office
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Just moved to new office and am still working on setup stuffs, most likely everything is done but need to be double confirmed. It’s a good office, and before we remodaling the cubicle, I will be sitting in this nice cube with pretty good view :P.
item.content:encoded:
Just moved to new office and am still working on setup stuffs, most likely everything is done but need to be double confirmed.

It’s a good office, and before we remodaling the cubicle, I will be sitting in this nice cube with pretty good view :P.

item.title: New office
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: Moved to new office last week, now I’m away from my team, but … I’m leaving soon so doesn’t matter too much. Wifi connection in the office is pretty bad, bad, bad. I’m using wired network for my working laptop and wifi for MBP … I almost lost connection every 30 minutes on my MBP. [...]
item.content:encoded:
Moved to new office last week, now I’m away from my team, but … I’m leaving soon so doesn’t matter too much.

Wifi connection in the office is pretty bad, bad, bad. I’m using wired network for my working laptop and wifi for MBP … I almost lost connection every 30 minutes on my MBP.

Also it’s cold here .

item.title: Geeze, they are still talking about Microsoft
item.dc:creator: Hang
item.description: I cannot believe that people from the team across the hallway are still talking about Microsoft! I mean it’s reasonable to discuss about it while it was uncertain so I didn’t complain even a little 3 weeks back as they need to communicate to make sure they are getting the right deal from Microsoft. However, [...]
item.content:encoded:
I cannot believe that people from the team across the hallway are still talking about Microsoft!

I mean it’s reasonable to discuss about it while it was uncertain so I didn’t complain even a little 3 weeks back as they need to communicate to make sure they are getting the right deal from Microsoft. However, since they’ve decided sign/not sign, they should get themselves prepared for moving to Microsoft or staying here.

Anyway – I’m abnormal for almost all the cases related to career, so my feeling could be weird.
